class.name: wxImageList
class.description: A wxImageList contains a list of images, which are stored in an unspecified form.

bitmap.label: Bitmap
bitmap.description: Adds a new image by keeping its optional mask bitmap.

bool.name: mask
bool.label: Mask
bool.description: If masks should be created for all images (default: true).

size.label: Size
size.description: The size of the images in the list (default: the size of the first bitmap).
